definition: to throw one's energies (into an activity)/to invest one's emotions (in sth)/to bet/betting
to cast/to send/to throw oneself (into the river etc)/to seek refuge/to place oneself into the hands of
to inject/to pour into/to concentrate/to pay attention/stake (gambling)/classifier for sums of money/variant of 註|注[zhu4]

sentences.english: This branch is obsoleted. Engineering resource will no longer be invested on this branch in general.
sentences.chinese: 此分支已淘汰，除特殊狀況人力不再投注於此版上。

sentences.english: Your bet can be for any game you chooser like.
sentences.chinese: 您的投注可以爲任何你喜歡的遊戲選擇器。

sentences.english: Billions of dollars are wagered each year on football in this country.
sentences.chinese: 數十億美元，每年投注足球在這個國家。

sentences.english: You will need a bookie to place high bettings on matches.
sentences.chinese: 你需要一個賭場工作者在比賽裏進行高投注。

sentences.english: Ultimately, the most trusted source of information is the bettor himself.
sentences.chinese: 最終，最值得信賴的信息來源是投注者本人。

sentences.english: So why do ordinary investors do it?
sentences.chinese: 那麼，爲什麼普通投資者還在投注呢？

sentences.english: Is Hanhan's "Lottery Agency" a talent scout or merely the commercial speculation?
sentences.chinese: 韓寒的“彩票投注站”，是伯樂相馬還是商業炒作？

sentences.english: Too much ADB money is still channeled toward fossil fuel energy.
sentences.chinese: 亞銀有太多經費投注在石化能源業。

sentences.english: You don't want to be a bettor who owes money to these individuals.
sentences.chinese: 你不想成爲一個投注者誰欠的錢給這些人。

sentences.english: After returning to the city, his first matter has soaked for one day in the bookie.
sentences.chinese: 回到城市後，他第一件事就是在投注站泡了一天。

sentences.english: Get betting lines on fast-paced, high-octane sports from around the world.
sentences.chinese: 獲得快節奏，高線投注，來自世界各地的體育辛烷值。

sentences.english: Which I'm betting is worth a lot more than anything else in here.
sentences.chinese: 這個足彩投注系統是我根據自己的經驗開發的。

sentences.english: The color people usually must purchase the lottery ticket to the nearby bookie.
sentences.chinese: 彩民們通常要到附近的投注站購買彩票。

sentences.english: He makes massive, highly- leveraged bets on the direction of the financial markets.
sentences.chinese: 他使得大規模，高槓桿金融市場的方向投注。

sentences.english: Through the current turnover ratios to estimate odds is very simple.
sentences.chinese: 要通過當前的投注額比例來估算賠率也很簡單。

sentences.english: Millions of people invest in bonds and other debt-based products.
sentences.chinese: 成千上萬的人將資金投注於債券和其他負債性產品。
